title: Get FREE Plants Using Cuttings, Grafting & Air Layering
itunes:title: Get FREE Plants Using Cuttings, Grafting & Air Layering
description: Learn how to use root cuttings, stem cuttings, and even air layering to create free berry, fruit, and herb plants from existing plants. What you need to know about rooting hormones, best time of year for success, and more in this episode with plant expert Leslie Halleck. For blog post, resources, links and more visit https://melissaknorris.com/276
